alert.note: Alert for Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 17 at 9:52AM EST until February 20 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is occurring * WHERE...A portion of the Vermilion River at the Mill Hollow and Bacon Woods Reservation. * WHEN...Until 345 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 943 AM EST, Emergency management reported an ice jam near Vermilion River at the Mill Hollow and Bacon Woods Reservation. Overflowing poor drainage areas have already caused minor flooding near Vermilion River at Mill Hollow, particularly on North Ridge Road. - Vermilion River at Mill Hollow and Bacon Woods is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. Quick rises along the river downstream are possible if a sudden release of the ice jam occurs. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mill Hollow and Bacon Woods Reservation. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
